sentences.sContent: Deposit any random checks you get - like rebate, rewards or reimbursement checks - into this fund.
sentences.sContent_eng: Deposit any random checks you get - like rebate, rewards or reimbursement checks - into this fund.
sentences.sCn: 把你挣的随机钱——比如像回扣，鉴赏，或偿款等——存到这个基金里。

sentences.sContent: I placed an order for desktop pc memory which came with a $20 MIR [mail in rebate].
sentences.sContent_eng: I placed an order for desktop pc memory which came with a $20 MIR [mail in rebate].
sentences.sCn: 我订购了一个价值20美元的桌面个人电脑存储器，可以申请回扣的。
